general.headline: ♛ Growth Hacker 🚀 SEO & SMM Specialist 👩‍💻 Digital Marketing Expert
general.school: Atmiya institute of technology and science
general.description:
*Recently Founded SolveMyHow.com and TechSanhita.com* 

Piyush Golani is one of the top bloggers and professional digital marketer from India. He founded 2 Technology blogs SolveMyHow.com and TechSanhita.com in 2014 and 2017. He completed his engineering in 2016.

Since then, he has helped hundreds of individuals and small businesses to increase their online visibility and integrate business with his blog. He has partnered with many international companies to promote their online businesses, and is one of the most active members of the Indian blogosphere. 

Having experience of 4 + yrs in SEO & Internet Marketing field. Strong knowledge of Internet Marketing terms like Social Media Optimization (SMO), Search Engine Optimization (SEO) as well as working knowledge of current and emerging trends and technologies Strong understanding of and experience with Google Analytics, Webmaster Tools, search algorithms and how they apply to aspects of Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

- Hands on Experience in e-commerce/Product based/Service based Websites
- Client interaction through Conference calls, Chats, Emails and Skype
- Analyzing Clients Websites/Blogs/Portals and suggest for necessary changing for SEO Campaign.

Specialties: ==> Marketing strategy development | Listening | engagement | Site audit | Audience analysis | Content cu-ration | Competitor analysis | Market insights | Social accounts management | Social media mentor | Metrics framework | Leading digital tools & analytics | Social Business Transformation | Mobile SEO | digital marketing strategist | Conversion rate optimization expert | Google AdWords Certified | Link building expert | Onpage SEO expert | Offpage SEO expert | Social media strategist | Email Marketing Expert | Digital Marketing automation strategist | Inbound marketing strategist | Content marketing strategist | Excellent Link Acquisition Skills

In nutshell, Piyush is kind of a Big Deal, who can generate lots of conversions/business...

jobs.description:
• Developing strategies to increase number of visitors to a website by getting high-ranking placements in search results.
• Perform competitive Keyword research & analysis, SEO and Conversion optimization audits using SEM Rush, Google keyword planner, Ahrefs, OSE, Word tracker, Onpage.org, Google Trends and Raven.
• Analyze and interpret website activity to support the overall Digital Marketing of the Company. Monitor multiple digital properties & reporting on Customer usage trends across various channels (main site, mobile web, apps) and device types (desktop, mobile, tablet).
• Creating monthly & weekly reports.
• Coordinate & analyze A/B tests and provided recommendations.
• Develop a strategy for category cleanup and structuring.
• Indepth analysis & feedback on product filters and content placement.
• Coordinate with designing & programming team on every aspect of website redesign, SERP indexilibility, making user friendly faster pages.
• Developing a penalty proof link building & link acquisition strategy.
• Testing the internal linking pattern on page by page basis in order for better PageRank & page authority sculpting, eliminating duplicate pages, verifying various advanced meta tags and implementing it for proper page priority signals.
• Communicating with clients, affiliate networks and affiliate partners.
• Developing strategy for SMO for various social media channels including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, reddit, StumbleUpon, etc. 
• Designing website banners and social media posts.
• Analyzing user behavior data from Google Analysis and planning season based email marketing campaigns with the help of email marketing team.
• Doing online reputation management for inhouse projects (webchanakya.com & Investplus.com) and for client's projects as well.
• Contributing to company and client blogs and managing e-communications.
• Developing & integrating content marketing strategies.
• Keeping up to date with current digital trends.

-- writing unique content using APP(agree, promise and preview) and bucket brigades technique.
-- Doing keyword research using keyword planner and power words advance technique.
-- publicizing article on social media sites using CTR magnet method,  Influence, Pre-outreach.
-- creating backlinks using web 2.0, Skyscrapper Technique, Moving Man Method, The content roadshow, broken link building.
- Website Analysis and work on Meta tag Optimization.
- Regular website health checks using webmaster and other tools. Fixing errors and on page factors using Google Webmaster Tool.
- Google Analytic for better results, from where visitors are coming to our site and why they are going back (bounce rate) and how we can stay them at our site.
- Optimizing HTML tags, folder names, page names & descriptions to improve SEO.
- Optimizing existing content, page titles and descriptions which helps in improving organic traffic.
- Implementing Google Analytic tracking on websites using Google-approved methods.
- HTML and XML sitemaps creation and implementation for indexing of deep listing pages.
- Analysis of daily traffic using Alexa and Google Analytic and implementing strategy to increase traffic.
- Knowledge of Mobile SEO
- Competitor Analysis using different SEO tools and developing strategy for link building and content optimization for higher organic traffic.
- Social Media Optimization on various Social Networking sites like Pinterest, Wordpress, Tumblr, Stumble upon, Twitter and Facebook.
- On page optimization: Help set, and work tools, performance indicators for SEO that everyone understands and which complement overall marketing and business objectives.
- Promote both offsite and onsite activities and also the interactions that build ranking, profile and traffic. Back link strategy and implementation.

jobs.description:
Implement, support, maintain, and optimize of VM servers, Exchange 2013, Domain
      controller, Cloud Sync Share Storage Server, Network infrastructure, Firewall and L3-L2
      switches, Mirantis, Openstack Autopilot Cloud Server, OpenNebula Cloud Server and
      
      AWS
Datacentre Operations

Directory Services: Active Directory Administration.

Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows Servers, Linux Servers, Novell Server, Macintosh.

Messaging Systems: Exchange Servers, Zimbra Linux Mail Server (Open Source)

Virtual Infrastructure: VMWare EXSi, Hyper-V Server.

Servers: Microsoft ISA Server, WSUS Server, TMG Server, Microsoft Disaster Planning Management Server, Antivirus Server, LDAP Server, DHCP Server, Printer Server, Clustering, Load Balancing.

Monitoring Tools: AdventNet Opmanager, Utangle, Cacti, Nagois, SolarWinds, PRTG, WhatsUp Gold, Sniffer, and Cisco Network Management.
 
Hardware: HP Proliant Servers, HP Blade Server, HP ML Servers, IBM x-Series & Tower Servers.
 
Networking: Routers, Switches (L2 & L3), Firewall, Wireless Routers, VSAT & Tulip IDU, Fiber Channel, Lease line Modems, Network Cabling.

I had been deputed in this organization as a IT Executive Managing Servers (like Microsoft Exchange 2007, ISA/Proxy Server, SMS Server, Voice Logger, Chatting Application Server, Zimbra Mail Server, etc.), Configuration and Administration of Microsoft Windows Server with Active Directory Services.
Responsible for Management and Monitoring of TrendMicro Office Scan Antivirus Server.
Administration, Monitoring, Disk space Management, Ensuring Data security and Access control on Servers.
Resolve HP Blade Server Related Issues & Networking Problems.
Maintain and Monitoring on Windows Servers and Linux Servers.
Manage Mailing Servers (i.e. 3 Exchange Servers & 10 Zimbra Servers).
Responsible for New released MS Windows patches installation on server and all client systems.
Implementation GPO Policy for Domain Systems & Network security for external traffic.
Responsible for Daily backup of mailboxes and active directory though backup application.
Manage WSUS server and see that all Servers & Systems are updated with Microsoft Updates, security patches & Hotfixes.
Responsible for Updating Antivirus & Microsoft Patches for nearly 80+ branches
Responsible for monitoring & testing of WAN Connectivity, Leased Line, Fiber, Wireless Connectivity, V-Sat, MPLS, PRI & ISDN Connectivity for all branches and clients.
Using Networking tools to monitor the Network (i.e. Cisco Network Management, Solar Winds, PRTG, etc.)
Implement VMware ESXi 5.0 and converted physical machines to virtual machines.
Configuring & managing System Central Data Protection Management server (DPM & SCVMM).
Implement Linux and windows server logs monitoring for SYSLOG server
Manage OpenFire Chat Messaging Server for better communication within branches.
Fail Over Cluster & Network Load Balancing.
Provide Remote Support to Branch for Installation & Configuration of Servers & Routers.

I had been deputed in this organization as a System Administrator. Managing a team of 5 Engineers. Also responsible for managing and monitoring LAN (200 PC’s + 25 Laptops) & WAN Setup for various sites of Rajoo Engineering Ltd. Well versed in working with SAP Severs & its Modules. Besides this assets management for office and branches was handled by me. Below points describes my Job profile:
Manage & Monitor Quick Heal Antivirus Server.
Manage SAP Servers and its Daily Backup Activity.
Configuring Cluster for of SAP Server.
Managing Cyberoam Firewall a100i for Network Security & Squid Proxy for Internet Sharing.
Responsible of Installation of Patches in SAP Server as well as Database Maintenance.
Configure SAP Policy in Firewall so that it can be accessed on remote locations.
Responsible for Managing Biometric Machines & CCTV Servers

Responsible for Management and Monitoring of TrendMicro Office Scan Antivirus Server.
Administration, Monitoring, Disk space Management, Ensuring Data security and Access control on Servers.
Resolve HP Blade Server Related Issues & Networking Problems.
Maintain and Monitoring on Windows Servers and Linux Servers.
Manage Mailing Servers (i.e. 3 Exchange Servers & 10 Zimbra Servers).
Responsible for New released MS Windows patches installation on server and all client systems.
Implementation GPO Policy for Domain Systems & Network security for external traffic.
Responsible for Daily backup of mailboxes and active directory though backup application.
Manage WSUS server and see that all Servers & Systems are updated with Microsoft Updates, security patches & Hotfixes.
Responsible for Updating Antivirus & Microsoft Patches for nearly 80+ branches.
Responsible for monitoring & testing of WAN Connectivity, Leased Line, Fiber, Wireless Connectivity, V-Sat, MPLS, PRI & ISDN Connectivity for all branches and clients.
Using Networking tools to monitor the Network (i.e. Cisco Network Management, Solar Winds, PRTG, etc.)
Implement VMware ESXi 5.0 and converted physical machines to virtual machines.

Implement Linux and windows server logs monitoring for SYSLOG server
Manage OpenFire Chat Messaging Server for better communication within branches.
Fail Over Cluster & Network Load Balancing.
Provide Remote Support to Branch for Installation & Configuration of Servers & Routers.

I had been deputed in this organization as a Sr. Technical Support Engineer giving support to more
than 40 clients in Rajkot, Jamnagar, Anand, Ahmedabad, Bhuj-Kutch & Gandhidham Districts. Troubleshooting Windows Servers, Windows Desktops, Printers & Network related issues. Provide End User support to client as per their needs and Create Windows or Linux Environment. Knowledge of Hubs, Switches and Routers. Maintain Full Client Records with their AMC details with time when call is locked and resolved within 48 hrs. Perform various Mail backups, Installation of antivirus and other packages etc. Also provide remote support to clients.
Below points describes my Job profile:
Maintenance of computers, installation of interface cards, setup of network printers and other peripherals.
Fine tune windows performance, troubleshoot and resolve desktop related issues; respond to and correct problems.
Research unknown system problems on the internet and fix them.
Install upgrades, patches for OS/Anti-virus and maintain inventory of all peripherals.
Resolve issues of LAN and other networking components.
Cabling structure using CAT6 cable.
Single point of contact for all communications between the customers and Company.
Managing staff to ensure that all milestones are achieved within the agreed timeframes.
Ensuring effective quality control processes are in place to monitor deliverables produced.
Maintaining client relationships.

Collabera is ranked amongst the top 10 Information Technology (IT) staffing firms in the U.S., with more than $550 million in sales revenue and a global presence that represents approximately 12,000+ professionals across North America (U.S., Canada), Asia Pacific (India, Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia) and the United Kingdom. We support our clients with a strong recruitment model and a sincere commitment to their success, which is why more than 75% of our clients rank us amongst their top three staffing suppliers. 

Not only are we committed to meeting and exceeding our customer’s needs, but also are committed to our employees’ satisfaction as well. We believe our employees are the cornerstone of our success and we make every effort to ensure their satisfaction throughout their tenure with Collabera. As a result of these efforts, we have been recognized by Staffing Industry Analysts (SIA) as the “Best Staffing Firm to Work For” for five consecutive years since 2012. Collabera has over 40 offices across the globe with a presence in seven countries and provides staff augmentation, managed services and direct placement services to global 2000 corporations. 

For consultants and employees, Collabera offers an enriching experience that promotes career growth and lifelong learning. Visit www.collabera.com to learn more about our latest job openings.

general.headline: Recruiter at PressureJet Systems Pvt Ltd

jobs.description:
-	Review and understand the client requirements. 
-	Identify the candidates that fit the requirement from various sources (Job Portals & LinkedIn)
-	Briefing the candidates about the job requirements. Screening, interviewing & validating the candidates as per requirements. 
-	Formatting resumes and forwarding the same to the client.
-	Scheduling interviews & tests of the shortlisted candidates with clients. 
-	Following up with both the client and the prospective candidate until all rounds of interview are done. 
-	Negotiating the offers between the client and the candidate and finalizing. 
-	Maintain status reports on various requirements, candidate status, offers and joining status.
-	Fostering long-term relationship with both the client and the candidate.
